channel.title: Cannot Connect To My Own Server
channel.description:
well i've just moved my server onto a vps and eveyone can connect fine apart from me as i get stuck on checking for updates 1%.
I've tried changing the ip's changing the custom client and had about 3 people on teamviewer all stumped at what the problem is.
I tried connecting on a different pc in my house so i thought it was my ip but then i changed my ip and i still couldnt connect.
Any help thanks.

yeah, we found solution he just used a vpn to connect
